A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First time reviewing a movie on the site.  SW:TLJ was...alright?  Had some pretty cool parts to it (Ben and Rey's fight was pretty sweet)\, had some disappointing parts to it (Snoke's death was just...ugh)\, had some really weird moments to it (Leia's superwoman moment?  Literally face-palmed in the movie).  I'd suggest watching it\, maybe even watching it twice; just don't be surprised if you come away a bit baffled by it.
